授業目的: Focusing on the structure and ideology of the American political and legal system, this course helps students understand contemporary politics and society. It provides students with a nuanced approach, beyond simple divisions of "left" and "right" to basic social conflicts within America and how the legal and political system provides the framework in which those issues must be negotiated.
到達目標: Students will gain a fuller understanding of how American politics works, and how the basic legal and political system provides the framework for negotiating and resolving conflict.
